name: ai-portfolio
description: AI-powered portfolio with RAG, MCP server, and intelligent agents

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../agent_service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.security:backend: cd backend && bandit -r . -f json -o bandit-report.json && safety check --json --output safety-report.json
scripts.security:all: npm run security:secrets && npm run security:backend && npm run security:frontend && npm run security:sast
scripts.format:all: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:agent
